top_stories.title: Audio Spectrogram Transformers Beyond the Lab
top_stories.description:
A recipe for building a portable soundscape monitoring app with AudioMoth, Raspberry Pi, and a decent dose of deep learning.
The post Audio Spectrogram Transformers Beyond the Lab appeared first on Towards Data Science.
top_stories.author: Maciej Adamiak

top_stories.title: Automate Models Training: An MLOps Pipeline with Tekton and Buildpacks
top_stories.description:
A step-by-step guide to containerizing and orchestrating an ML training workflow without the Dockerfile headache, using a lightweight GPT-2 example.
The post Automate Models Training: An MLOps Pipeline with Tekton and Buildpacks appeared first on Towards Data Science.
top_stories.author: Sylvain Kalache

top_stories.title: OpenAI’s open model is delayed
top_stories.description: OpenAI was targeting an early summer release date for its open model, which is slated to have similar "reasoning" capabilities to OpenAI's o-series of models.
top_stories.author: Maxwell Zeff

top_stories.title: 10,000x Faster Bayesian Inference: Multi-GPU SVI vs. Traditional MCMC
top_stories.description:
Using GPU acceleration to speed up Bayesian Inference from months to minutes... 
The post 10,000x Faster Bayesian Inference: Multi-GPU SVI vs. Traditional MCMC appeared first on Towards Data Science.
top_stories.author: Derek Tran

top_stories.title: AI storage platform Vast Data aimed for $25B valuation in new round, sources say
top_stories.description: The AI-friendly data storage startup is raising capital at a giant leap in valuation.
top_stories.author: Marina Temkin
